limit_generation._comment: Note: this options are to limit the generation of pokemon that can be used in game
limit_generation._comment1: If you wish to enable this for a specific randomizer only just change the no to yes
limit_generation._comment5: Options are still depedent on the other settings.
limit_generation._comment2: fill out like this: 'generations_allowed': [1,2,3] - this will only allow gens 1-3 to be used
limit_generation._comment3: as a fail safe if its enabled and empty then all generations will be used.
limit_generation._comment4: limits for randomized evolutions if they are active.

wild_randomizer._comment1: The next two options are not available on generation limit.

bulk_creation._comment: Default is 0 - if enabled and left at 0 then only 1 will be created

trainer_randomizer._comment0: Note Raid_NPC are part of important trainers

starter_randomizer._comment7: As long as the force_starter is a dex number or a valid english pokemon name
starter_randomizer._comment8: Ex: 1024, Tera Pagos, teRapagos, t e r a pa gos are all valid for Terapagos
starter_randomizer._comment9: However 1 0 2 4 is not a valid input for terapagos
starter_randomizer._comment10: Similarly tera_paGos is not a valid input for terapagos
starter_randomizer._comment: Only current way of having shiny starters is by inverting the textures
starter_randomizer._comment2: Therefore - only have this active if you wish to have inverted textures
starter_randomizer._comment3: Only recommended if you want to do things like 'Choosing Starter' type of things
starter_randomizer._comment4: If you wish to play the game with a shiny starter without carrying about its overworld
starter_randomizer._comment5: texture when picking it - then please have it as no. Else have it as yes.
starter_randomizer._comment6: Does not work with randomize_all_gifts as it assumes you'll be playing the whole game.

item_randomizer._comment: Only works on hidden items - I can't find file for overworld items.
item_randomizer._comment2: This could also be synchro machine
item_randomizer._comment1: Following setting if active will make TMS uncraftable
